adHeader: Math and Science Tutoring From a Cal Bear
adDetails: Hi all, Are you looking for a science (chemistry, biology, physics, physiology) or math (geometry, algebra II/trigonometry, pre-calculus, calculus) tutor for the summer of 2014? I graduated from UC Berkeley in 2013 with a bachelor's degree in molecular and cell biology and Monta Vista High School in 2009. My rate is $30/hr for one-to-one tutoring. My phone number is show contact info. Have a great summer, Jennifer
